metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15678 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow in rfbServerCutText handler, which can potentially result code execution.. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity. Pavel Cheremushkin discovered that TightVNC contains a heap buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker could use it to cause a Denial of Service or possible a remote code execution.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this CVE is for tightvnc, the equivalent flaw was CVE-2018-20019 in libvncserver

criterions.comment: bochs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
